attributes.action: Write a letter to the publishers of the English Oxford Dictionary to put the word 'simples' in the English Oxford Dictionary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The word 'simples' has a meaning in physics already, but we want to see that word put into the oxford English Dictionary. First used by Aleksandr Orlov to advertise car insurance, we demand a letter be written by the prime minister to the publishers of the Oxford English Dictionary requesting 'simples' be added to the oxford English Dictionary.

Writing a letter, in my opinion, is well within the powers of the prime minister

rejection.details: Can I suggest that you write to the publishers of the English Oxford Dictionary in the first instance?  They will be able to advise you of the correct process.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
